00015 UINT8 ubDrugTravelRate[]                  = { 4,      2 };
00016 UINT8 ubDrugWearoffRate[]                 = { 2,      2 };
00017 UINT8 ubDrugEffect[]                            = { 15, 8 };
00018 UINT8 ubDrugSideEffect[]                  = { 20, 10 };
00019 UINT8 ubDrugSideEffectRate[]  = { 2,      1 };
00020 
00021 INT32 giDrunkModifier[] =
00022 {
00023       100,        // Sober
00024       75,               // Feeling good,
00025       65,               // Bporderline
00026       50,               // Drunk
00027       100,        // HungOver
00028 };

00030 #define HANGOVER_AP_REDUCE                5
00031 #define HANGOVER_BP_REDUCE                200

00033 
00034 UINT8 GetDrugType( UINT16 usItem )
00035 {
00036       if ( usItem == ADRENALINE_BOOSTER )
00037       {
00038             return( DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE );
00039       }
00040 
00041       if ( usItem == REGEN_BOOSTER )
00042       {
00043             return( DRUG_TYPE_REGENERATION );
00044       }
00045 
00046       if ( usItem == ALCOHOL || usItem == WINE || usItem == BEER )
00047       {
00048             return( DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL );
00049       }
00050 
00051 
00052       return( NO_DRUG );
00053 }

00055             
00056 BOOLEAN ApplyDrugs( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, OBJECTTYPE *pObject )
00057 {
00058       UINT8 ubDrugType;
00059       UINT8 ubKitPoints;
00060       INT8  bRegenPointsGained;
00061       UINT16      usItem;
00062 
00063       usItem = pObject->usItem;
00064 
00065       // If not a syringe, return
00066 
00067       ubDrugType = GetDrugType( usItem );
00068 
00069       // Determine what type of drug....
00070       if ( ubDrugType == NO_DRUG )
00071       {
00072             return( FALSE );
00073       }
00074 
00075       // do switch for Larry!!
00076       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == LARRY_NORMAL )
00077       {
00078             pSoldier = SwapLarrysProfiles( pSoldier );
00079       }
00080       else if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == LARRY_DRUNK )
00081       {
00082             gMercProfiles[ LARRY_DRUNK ].bNPCData = 0;
00083       }
00084 
00085       if ( ubDrugType < NUM_COMPLEX_DRUGS )
00086       {
00087 
00088             // Add effects
00089             if ( ( pSoldier->bFutureDrugEffect[ ubDrugType ] + ubDrugEffect[ ubDrugType ] ) < 127 )
00090             {
00091                   pSoldier->bFutureDrugEffect[ ubDrugType ]                                     += ubDrugEffect[ ubDrugType ];
00092             }
00093             pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ ubDrugType ]                                              = ubDrugTravelRate[ ubDrugType ];
00094 
00095             // Increment times used during lifetime...
00096             // CAP!
00097             if ( ubDrugType == DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE )
00098             {
00099                   if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubNumTimesDrugUseInLifetime != 255 )
00100                   {
00101                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].ubNumTimesDrugUseInLifetime++;
00102                   }
00103             }
00104 
00105             // Reset once we sleep...
00106             pSoldier->bTimesDrugUsedSinceSleep[ ubDrugType ]++;
00107 
00108             // Increment side effects..
00109             if ( ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ] + ubDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ] ) < 127 )
00110             {
00111                   pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ]                                              += ( ubDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ] );
00112             }
00113             // Stop side effects until were done....
00114             pSoldier->bDrugSideEffectRate[ ubDrugType ]                                    = 0;
00115 
00116             
00117             if ( ubDrugType == DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL )
00118             {
00119                   // ATE: use kit points...
00120                   if ( usItem == ALCOHOL )
00121                   {
00122                         ubKitPoints = 10;
00123                   }
00124                   else if ( usItem == WINE )
00125                   {
00126                         ubKitPoints = 20;
00127                   }
00128                   else
00129                   {
00130                         ubKitPoints = 100;
00131                   }
00132 
00133                   UseKitPoints( pObject, ubKitPoints, pSoldier );
00134             }
00135             else
00136             {
00137                   // Remove the object....
00138                   DeleteObj( pObject );
00139 
00140                   // ATE: Make guy collapse from heart attack if too much stuff taken....
00141                   if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffectRate[ ubDrugType ] > ( ubDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ] * 3 ) )
00142                   {
00143                         // Keel over...
00144                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, 0, 10000 );
00145 
00146                         // Permanently lower certain stats...
00147                         pSoldier->bWisdom    -= 5;
00148                         pSoldier->bDexterity -= 5;
00149                         pSoldier->bStrength  -= 5;
00150 
00151                         if (pSoldier->bWisdom < 1)
00152                               pSoldier->bWisdom = 1;
00153                         if (pSoldier->bDexterity < 1)
00154                               pSoldier->bDexterity = 1;
00155                         if (pSoldier->bStrength < 1)
00156                               pSoldier->bStrength = 1;
00157 
00158                         // export stat changes to profile
00159                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bWisdom    = pSoldier->bWisdom;
00160                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bDexterity = pSoldier->bDexterity;
00161                         gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bStrength  = pSoldier->bStrength;
00162 
00163                         // make those stats RED for a while...
00164                         pSoldier->uiChangeWisdomTime = GetJA2Clock();
00165                         pSoldier->usValueGoneUp &= ~( WIS_INCREASE );
00166                         pSoldier->uiChangeDexterityTime = GetJA2Clock();
00167                         pSoldier->usValueGoneUp &= ~( DEX_INCREASE );
00168                         pSoldier->uiChangeStrengthTime = GetJA2Clock();
00169                         pSoldier->usValueGoneUp &= ~( STRENGTH_INCREASE );
00170                   }
00171             }
00172       }
00173       else
00174       {
00175             if ( ubDrugType == DRUG_TYPE_REGENERATION )
00176             {
00177                   // each use of a regen booster over 1, each day, reduces the effect
00178                   bRegenPointsGained = REGEN_POINTS_PER_BOOSTER * pObject->bStatus[0] / 100;
00179                   // are there fractional %s left over?
00180                   if ( ( pObject->bStatus[0] % (100 / REGEN_POINTS_PER_BOOSTER ) ) != 0 )
00181                   {
00182                         // chance of an extra point
00183                         if ( PreRandom( 100 / REGEN_POINTS_PER_BOOSTER ) < (UINT32) ( pObject->bStatus[0] % (100 / REGEN_POINTS_PER_BOOSTER ) ) )
00184                         {
00185                               bRegenPointsGained++;
00186                         }
00187                   }
00188                   
00189                   bRegenPointsGained -= pSoldier->bRegenBoostersUsedToday;
00190                   if (bRegenPointsGained > 0)
00191                   {
00192                         // can't go above the points you get for a full boost
00193                         pSoldier->bRegenerationCounter = __min( pSoldier->bRegenerationCounter + bRegenPointsGained, REGEN_POINTS_PER_BOOSTER );
00194                   }
00195                   pSoldier->bRegenBoostersUsedToday++;
00196             }
00197 
00198             // remove object
00199             DeleteObj( pObject );
00200       }
00201 
00202       if ( ubDrugType == DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL )
00203       {
00204             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_DRANK_SOME ], pSoldier->name, ShortItemNames[ usItem ] );
00205       }
00206       else
00207       {
00208             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_MERC_TOOK_DRUG ], pSoldier->name );          
00209       }
00210 
00211   // Dirty panel
00212   fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00213    
00214       return( TRUE );
00215 }
00216 
00217 void HandleEndTurnDrugAdjustments( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00218 {
00219       INT32 cnt, cnt2;
00220       INT32 iNumLoops;
00221 //    INT8 bBandaged;
00222 
00223       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_COMPLEX_DRUGS; cnt++ )
00224       {
00225             // If side effect aret is non-zero....
00226             if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffectRate[ cnt ] > 0 )
00227             {     
00228                   // Subtract some...
00229                   pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ cnt ] -= pSoldier->bDrugSideEffectRate[ cnt ];
00230 
00231                   // If we're done, we're done!
00232                   if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ cnt ] <= 0 )
00233                   {
00234                         pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ cnt ] = 0;
00235                         fInterfacePanelDirty    = DIRTYLEVEL1;
00236                   }
00237             }
00238 
00239             // IF drug rate is -ve, it's being worn off...
00240             if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ] < 0 )
00241             {
00242                   pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ cnt ]                    -= ( -1 * pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ] );
00243             
00244                   // Have we run out?
00245                   if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ cnt ] <= 0 )
00246                   {
00247                         pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ cnt ] = 0;
00248 
00249         // Dirty panel
00250         fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00251 
00252                         // Start the bad news!
00253                         pSoldier->bDrugSideEffectRate[ cnt ] = ubDrugSideEffectRate[ cnt ];
00254 
00255                         // The drug rate is 0 now too
00256                         pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ]          = 0;
00257 
00258                         // Once for each 'level' of crash....
00259                         iNumLoops = ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ cnt ] / ubDrugSideEffect[ cnt ] ) + 1;
00260 
00261                         for ( cnt2 = 0; cnt2 < iNumLoops; cnt2++ )
00262                         {
00263                               // OK, give a much BIGGER morale downer
00264                               if ( cnt == DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL )
00265                               {
00266                                     HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_ALCOHOL_CRASH, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
00267                               }
00268                               else
00269                               {
00270                                     HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_DRUGS_CRASH, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ  );
00271                               }
00272                         }
00273                   }
00274             }
00275 
00276             // Add increase ineffect....
00277             if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ] > 0 )
00278             {     
00279                   // Seap some in....
00280                   pSoldier->bFutureDrugEffect[ cnt ] -= pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ];
00281                   pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ cnt ]                    += pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ];
00282 
00283                   // Refresh morale w/ new drug value...
00284                   RefreshSoldierMorale( pSoldier );
00285 
00286                   // Check if we need to stop 'adding'
00287                   if ( pSoldier->bFutureDrugEffect[ cnt ] <= 0 )
00288                   {
00289                         pSoldier->bFutureDrugEffect[ cnt ] = 0;
00290                         // Change rate to -ve..
00291                         pSoldier->bDrugEffectRate[ cnt ]          = -ubDrugWearoffRate[ cnt ];
00292                   }
00293             }
00294       }
00295 
00296       if ( pSoldier->bRegenerationCounter > 0)
00297       {
00298 //          bBandaged = BANDAGED( pSoldier );
00299 
00300             // increase life
00301             pSoldier->bLife = __min( pSoldier->bLife + LIFE_GAIN_PER_REGEN_POINT, pSoldier->bLifeMax );
00302 
00303             if ( pSoldier->bLife == pSoldier->bLifeMax )
00304             {
00305                   pSoldier->bBleeding = 0;
00306             }
00307             else if ( pSoldier->bBleeding + pSoldier->bLife > pSoldier->bLifeMax )
00308             {
00309                   // got to reduce amount of bleeding
00310                   pSoldier->bBleeding = (pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife);
00311             }
00312 
00313             // decrement counter
00314             pSoldier->bRegenerationCounter--;
00315       }
00316 }

00324 INT8 GetDrugSideEffect( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubDrugType )
00325 {
00326       // If we have a o-positive effect
00327       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ ubDrugType ] > 0 )
00328       {
00329             return( 0 );
00330       }
00331       else
00332       {
00333             return( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ ubDrugType ] );
00334       }

00336 
00337 void HandleAPEffectDueToDrugs( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 *pubPoints )
00338 {
00339       INT8  bDrunkLevel;
00340   INT16  sPoints = (*pubPoints);
00341 
00342       // Are we in a side effect or good effect?
00343       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00344       {
00345             // Adjust!
00346             sPoints += pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ];
00347       }
00348       else if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00349       {
00350             // Adjust!
00351             sPoints -= pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ];
00352 
00353             if ( sPoints < AP_MINIMUM )
00354             {
00355                   sPoints = AP_MINIMUM;
00356             }
00357       }
00358 
00359       bDrunkLevel = GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier );
00360 
00361       if ( bDrunkLevel == HUNGOVER )
00362       {
00363             // Reduce....
00364             sPoints -= HANGOVER_AP_REDUCE;
00365 
00366             if ( sPoints < AP_MINIMUM )
00367             {
00368                   sPoints = AP_MINIMUM;
00369             }
00370       }
00371 
00372   (*pubPoints) = (UINT8)sPoints;
00373 }
00374 
00375 
00376 void HandleBPEffectDueToDrugs( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 *psPointReduction )
00377 {
00378       INT8 bDrunkLevel;
00379 
00380       // Are we in a side effect or good effect?
00381       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00382       {
00383             // Adjust!
00384             (*psPointReduction) -= ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL );
00385       }
00386       else if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00387       {
00388             // Adjust!
00389             (*psPointReduction) += ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] * BP_RATIO_RED_PTS_TO_NORMAL );
00390       }
00391 
00392       bDrunkLevel = GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier );
00393 
00394       if ( bDrunkLevel == HUNGOVER )
00395       {
00396             // Reduce....
00397             (*psPointReduction) += HANGOVER_BP_REDUCE;
00398       }
00399 }
00400 
00401 
00402 INT8 GetDrunkLevel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00403 {
00404       INT8 bNumDrinks;
00405 
00406       // If we have a -ve effect ...
00407       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] == 0 && pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] == 0 )
00408       {
00409             return( SOBER );
00410       }
00411 
00412       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] == 0 && pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] != 0 )
00413       {
00414             return( HUNGOVER );
00415       }
00416 
00417       // Calculate how many dinks we have had....
00418       bNumDrinks = ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] / ubDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ALCOHOL ] );
00419 
00420       if ( bNumDrinks <= 3 )
00421       {
00422             return( FEELING_GOOD );
00423       }
00424       else if ( bNumDrinks <= 4 )
00425       {
00426             return( BORDERLINE );
00427       }
00428       else
00429       {
00430             return( DRUNK );
00431       }
00432 }
00433 
00434 
00435 INT32 EffectStatForBeingDrunk( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT32 iStat )
00436 {
00437       return( ( iStat * giDrunkModifier[ GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier ) ] / 100 ) );
00438 }

00440 
00441 BOOLEAN MercUnderTheInfluence( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00442 {
00443       // Are we in a side effect or good effect?
00444       if ( pSoldier->bDrugEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00445       {
00446             return( TRUE );
00447       }
00448       else if ( pSoldier->bDrugSideEffect[ DRUG_TYPE_ADRENALINE ] )
00449       {
00450             return( TRUE );
00451       }
00452 
00453       if ( GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier ) != SOBER )
00454       {
00455             return( TRUE );
00456       }
00457 
00458       return( FALSE );
00459 }
